summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no information available about Kevin Walsh. The documents pertain to the payroll records of the U.S. House of Representatives Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA) and notifications regarding the release status of these records. The documents primarily focus on the protection of personal information, specifically Social Security numbers, within the payroll data. Therefore, it is not possible to provide a summary about Kevin Walsh's role, connections, or timeline of involvement in the JFK assassination context based solely on these documents.
